pages.title: Potion Melder
pages.description: Converts three doses of a potion from two Potion Jars and outputs a potion with the combined effects. Use the Dominion Wand from a Potion Jar to Melder to link a jar for consumption. Link two input potion jars to the melder. Then, use the wand on the Melder and then to a third jar to set the output. The Potion Melder requires source per mix.
